title: [Bericsaba Market, Colonnade]
description: Thuja and cypress trees loom in quiet rhythm, their interwoven boughs creating a screen before a tile-lined patio where food vendors work over glowing embers.  Frosted glass lanterns cluster beneath the arches, their softened light pooling against the marble floor.  Resting within the colonnade is a white pine kiosk, its pale surface standing out against the deep hues of woven blankets, cloaks, and shawls draped in brilliant layers.
paths: Obvious paths: north, southeast, southwest, west, northwest
